mapper.select: select app_system_id as appSystemId, app_module_id as appModuleId, env_id as envId, version_id as versionId, build_no as buildNo, lcu, lcd from deploy_env_version where app_system_id = #{appSystemId} and app_module_id = #{appModuleId} and env_id = #{envId} for update

select id, app_system_id as appSystemId, app_module_id as appModuleId, env_id as envId, new_version_id as newVersionId, old_version_id as oldVersionId, new_build_no as newBuildNo, old_build_no as oldBuildNo, direction, fcu, fcd from deploy_env_version_audit where app_system_id = #{appSystemId} and app_module_id = #{appModuleId} and env_id = #{envId} and new_version_id = #{newVersionId} order by id asc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into deploy_env_version_audit ( id, app_system_id, app_module_id, env_id, new_version_id, old_version_id, new_build_no, old_build_no, direction, fcu, fcd ) values ( #{id}, #{appSystemId}, #{appModuleId}, #{envId}, #{newVersionId}, #{oldVersionId}, #{newBuildNo}, #{oldBuildNo}, #{direction}, #{fcu}, now(3) )
